message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this amazing product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $7,500. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  How about $7,000?  I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to pay a lower price, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $7,250. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
